title: Which music app will let me download songs and listen to them offline? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you like to listen to podcasts, lectures, or other audio while you drive, work, or exercise. you should be able to take advantage of the huge amount of content published online every day. Streaming music is great, but you still want to enjoy music if you are away from an Internet connection. Trying to download steaming music directly to your computer, phones, tablets can be quite difficult because sites usually have different security measures put in place, making it near impossible unless you’re a hacker. Therefore, you need an efficient music downloader It shares you the method of downloading high quality MP3 songs from Spotify/Apple Music/Amazon Music permanently to computer, then simply save to your computer, phones, tablets. You can refer to this article if you need to know how to keep songs from Spotify for an offline listening: Permanently Download Streaming Music from Spotify/Apple Music/Amazon Music

Relisten is an app only available in the Apple Store that has nearly every major jamband act including nearly every Greatful Dead and Phish show. You can listen to shows offline by download or stream. The best part it is free. It is all legal, the source material are from tappers, which are allowed in most jamband concerts with a special ticket. On a side note tappers are the reason The Greatful Dead had such a following with out radio play. Another free and legal source for music and a lot more is archive org here is the link Digital Library of Free Books, Movies, Music & Wayback Machine. Archive org has many legally recorded music by tappers, movies, and books that are in the public domain. The WaybackMachine machine of which it is part of the Internet Archive lets you look up older versions of websites. Archive has several apps that can be downloaded from the link provided.
